mapper.insert: insert into comment(member_id, article_id, child_id, content, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by) values (#{memberId}, #{articleId}, #{childId}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedAt}, #{updatedBy});
mapper.select: select id, member_id, article_id, child_id, content, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by from comment where id = #{id}
